title: Pajama Sam Games to Play on Any Day
description:
The missing game from my Pajama Sam torrent: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/10672815/Pajama_Sam_Complete_

You'll need a zip or rar extractor to open the file. Pajama Sam Games to Play on Any Day requires Scummvm to work: http://scummvm.org/downloads/?p=downloads


MMore Humongous Entertainment:
Putt Putt + Fatty Bear which includes scummvm but is not necessary for the games to work as they are run by one .exe: http://thebootlegbay.com/torrent/10643061/Putt_Putt_Complete___Fatty_Bear_Complete_[Humongous_Entertainmen
